summary:
Performance of players will be close to the NPC.
NPC of performance will be close to the player.
No Script.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]　
Content[/size]
[color=#cccccc]Performance of players will be close to the NPC.
NPC of performance will be close to the player.
No Script.
[/color][size=2][color=#cccccc]Full ver requires all the DLC. The skilled person who is able to make a patch for yourself [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url].
Lite ver the DLC is not required. Swimming and arrows and immortality does not apply.[/color]
[/size]
[color=#f4cccc][size=5]NPCs[/size][/color]
[color=#ea9999]Become swim *1
Finite Ammo *1
To kill the Invincible of the NPC *1
 (It must be a power attack in down)
Darkness is adapted
 (Sin will be severely instead)
Greeting moderation
Fixed was full poor
You do not block the road
To the normal NPC high aim precision
It is not the avoidance of unreasonable
It was normally guards it was high damage magnification only to player
*1 = Lite ver can not be used in[/color]

[color=#cfe2f3][size=5]Player[/size][/color]
[color=#a4c2f4]Player is not forced to Mage
(MagicBook is found in between from Helgen of Riverwood)
Eliminate the blurring of the Auto Aim
(Combat Target does not disappear)
---Add Skyrim.ini---
[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=  *2
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=  *2
f1PBoltTiltUpAngle=  *2
f3PBoltTiltUpAngle=  *2
[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=  *3
----------------------
*2 = 0.3~1.4 (Proper value is different by player)
*3 = 4096,8192,12288[/color]

[color=#d9ead3][size=5]Player & NPCs[/size][/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Share of realistic speed[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Player & NPCs Sprint : 500 => 500 (20km/h) Speed of Reference[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Player & NPCs Run : 370 => 400 (16km/h)[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Player & NPCs Walk : 80 => 125 (5km/h)[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Swim,Sneak,Magic,Bow => 125 Are unified in speed of walking is running[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Horse Sprint : 600 => 1200 (48km/h)[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Horse Run : 450 => 510 (20.4km/h)[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Horse Walk : 125 => 165 (6.6km/h)[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Horse Swim : 210 => 144 (3.6km/h)[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Werewolf Sprint 530 => 875 (35km/h) Half speed of the real wolf[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Werewolf Run 400 => 625 (25km/h)[/color]
[color=#b6d7a8]Werewolf Walk 70 => 100 (4km/h)[/color]

[color=#fff2cc][size=5]Note[/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][size=2][color=#ffe599]v1.3 fix
Velocity adjustment
Vender gold x4 => x3
Remove No Combat in Water 
Alduin,CWBattleGalmar, CWBattleRikke, CWBattleUlfric, CWBattleTullius[/color]

[/size][color=#ead1dc][size=5]Recommend[/size][/color]
[color=#d5a6bd]Resurrect Mod[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15236/?]FCResurrect [/url] , [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55166/?]Resurrect Dead Spell
[/url][color=#d5a6bd]Start Mod[/color][size=2] [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17]Quick Start[/url][size=2] , [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8207]Dimes Quickstart[/url][size=2] , [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557]Alternate Start - Live Another Life
[/url]
